tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS abandoned_carts (
    cart_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    product_id UUID,
    quantity INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS customer_details (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT,
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS remarketing_strategies (
    strategy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
